chapter.title: Installing GT 4.0

listitem.para: First, download the required software noted above.

Be aware that Apache Ant will use the Java referred to by JAVA_HOME, not necessarily the first Java executable on your PATH. Be sure to set JAVA_HOME to the top-level directory of your Java installation before installing.

If you want to build RLS, set GLOBUS_IODBC_PATH to point to the directory containing the IODBC driver. If you do not, the build of RLS will be skipped. You may finish the installation of RLS separately from the main build.

Create a user named "globus". This non-privileged user will be used to perform administrative tasks such as starting and stopping the container, deploying services, etc. Make sure this account has read and write permissions in the $GLOBUS_LOCATION directory.

listitem.programlisting: globus$ export GLOBUS_LOCATION=/usr/local/globus-3.9.4 globus$ ./configure --prefix=$GLOBUS_LOCATION globus$ make
listitem.para: You can use command line arguments to ./configure for a more custom install:
listitem.programlisting:
Optional Features: --disable-FEATURE do not include FEATURE (same as --enable-FEATURE=no) --enable-FEATURE[=ARG] include FEATURE [ARG=yes] --disable-prewsgram Don't build pre-webservices GRAM. Default is enabled. --disable-gridftp Don't build GridFTP. Default is enabled. --disable-prewsmds Don't build pre-webservices mds. Default is enabled. --disable-rls Don't build RLS. Default is enabled, but you must also specify an IODBC driver using --with-iodbc --disable-wsjava Don't build java webservices core. Default is enabled. --disable-wsmds Don't build webservices Monitoring and Discovery Services. Default is enabled. --disable-wsdel Don't build webservices delegation code. Default is enabled. --disable-wsrft Don't build webservices Reliable File Transfer. Default is enabled. --disable-wsgram Don't build webservices GRAM. Default is enabled. --enable-wsgram-condor Build GRAM Condor scheduler interface. Default is disabled. --enable-wsgram-lsf Build GRAM LSF scheduler interface. Default is disabled. --enable-wsgram-pbs Build GRAM PBS scheduler interface. Default is disabled. --enable-i18n Enable internationalization. Default is disabled. --disable-wscas Don't build webservices Community Authorization Service. Default is enabled. --disable-wsc Don't build C webservices core. Default is enabled. --disable-tests Don't build C test packages. Default is enabled. --disable-wstests Don't build webservices test packages. Default is enabled.
Optional Packages: --with-PACKAGE[=ARG] use PACKAGE [ARG=yes] --without-PACKAGE do not use PACKAGE (same as --with-PACKAGE=no) --with-flavor=flavor Use flavor as the base for GPT builds. --with-buildopts="args" Arguments to pass to gpt-build, like "--verbose" or "--force". --with-iodbc=dir Use the iodbc library in dir/lib/libiodbc.so. Required for RLS builds.

listitem.para: You may replace /usr/local/globus-3.9.4 with whatever directory you wish to install to.

chapter.para: Important: If for some reason you do not create a user named "globus", be sure to run the installation as a non-root user.
